sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This custom action allows users to quickly and easily update any Catalog Item's Variable. It enables no-code approach as actions require only 3 mandatory input arguments from the user. User must only know what should be updated and where.

If a variable is of any type that requires display value in the notes a user can provide additional information on where to look for this value.

Input required:

  • Requested Item's number
  • Name of the Service Catalog Variable to be updated
  • New value
  • Information if value of variable is a reference(set to false if not reference, optional parameter)
  • Referenced table (only required if value requires reference, optional parameter)
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Update Service Catalog Variable
